statements: SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Pending';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_id=1;
SELECT task_description FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to='John Doe';
SELECT task_status FROM tasks WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, due_date, task_status FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE due_date >= '2021-09-30';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, task_status FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT task_name, completion_date FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to='John';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, completion_date FROM tasks WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role='Manager';
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE role='Developer';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status = 'incomplete';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, completion_date FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, status FROM tasks WHERE completion_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, status FROM tasks WHERE status LIKE '%complete%' AND completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT t.task_name, m.member_name FROM tasks t INNER JOIN team_members m ON t.assigned_to = m.member_name ORDER BY t.task_name ASC, m.member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members ORDER BY member_role ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Pending';
SELECT update_text, update_date FROM task_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, member_name FROM tasks INNER JOIN team_members ON tasks.assigned_to = team_members.member_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Manager';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';

SELECT team_members.member_name, tasks.task_name, task_updates.update_text FROM team_members JOIN tasks ON team_members.member_id = tasks.assigned_to JOIN task_updates ON tasks.task_id = task_updates.task_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_id DESC;

SELECT team_members.member_name, task_updates.update_text, update_date FROM team_members JOIN tasks ON team_members.member_id = tasks.assigned_to JOIN task_updates ON tasks.task_id = task_updates.task_id WHERE tasks.task_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress' LIMIT 3;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, t.email AS team_member_email FROM tasks JOIN team_members t ON tasks.assigned_to = t.member_name WHERE tasks.task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_name, assigned_date FROM tasks JOIN task_assignments ON tasks.task_id = task_assignments.task_id;
SELECT tasks.task_name, task_history.status FROM tasks JOIN task_history ON tasks.task_id = task_history.task_id WHERE task_history.status = 'Completed';
SELECT member_name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, status, start_date FROM tasks WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT task_name, status, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, role FROM tasks t INNER JOIN task_assignments ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id INNER JOIN team_members tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, start_date FROM tasks ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks WHERE status='Pending' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.task_name, tm.member_name, ta.assigned_date FROM tasks t JOIN task_assignments ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id JOIN team_members tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id;
SELECT th.history_id, th.status, m.member_name, th.update_date FROM task_history th JOIN team_members m ON th.updated_by = m.member_id;
